import { Props, Story, Preview } from "@storybook/addon-docs/blocks";
import { Footer} from '../../Components/Organisms/Footer';

# Footer

`import { Footer, FooterLeft, FooterRight, FooterBody } from "@elevenia/master-ui/Components/Organisms/Mobile/Footer";`


`Footer` is a base for Footer in mobile. <br/>
Consists of `FooterLeft` for container left side, `FooterRight` for container right side, `FooterBody` for container center side component in Footer.<br/>

## Stories
<br/>

### Basic

`FooterLeft` as container of logo and text and  `FooterLeft` as container of [ButtonGroup](?path=/docs/atom-button-group--default) with two [Button](/?path=/docs/atom-button--basic).

<Preview>
  <Story id="organisms-footer--basic"/>
</Preview>


## Props
<Props of={Footer}/>
